message: Not a legitimate performance mod. It was made to bait users for a YouTube video.
Has no performance gain and may even reduce performance for some users.
Original and Kedition forks are outdated. Use #link:[Avaritia 1.1x Unofficial Extended Life](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/avaritia-1-1x-unofficial).

patchList.modDescription: Minimally invasive fixes for Battle Towers.

message: Outdated. Use #link:[Bubbles](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/bubbles-a-baubles-fork). If incompatibilities occur, revert to Baubles.
Fix already included in Forge / Cleanroom Loader, does nothing when installed.
Does not provide any meaningful performance improvements or fixes, can only provide a biome blending visual.
Performance heavy and known to cause incompatibility issues with certain mods including VintageFix.
Outdated. Use #link:[Better Questing Unofficial](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/better-questing-unofficial) which merges the Quest Book and Standard Expansion.
Outdated and has several bugs. Use #link:[Blockcraftery: Refurbished](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/blockcraftery-refurbished).
MCreator mod with numerous bugs in 1.12.2. Use an alternative biome mod.
Outdated and has several bugs. Use #link:[Charset CRE](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/charset-cre).

Very outdated and WILL screw up mob spawns in many mods. If you are using Mo' Creatures, it is highly recommended to use #link:[Mo' Creatures Extended](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mo-creatures-extended) instead which removes the dependency.
Does almost nothing except move unloadChunk to tick; caches chunks indefinitely which might impact RAM usage.
Future Fireproof has a better implementation and API features. #link:[Future Fireproof](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/future-fireproof).
Has little to no performance gain. It is highly recommended to use #link:[FPS Reducer](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/fps-reducer) instead for the same functionality.
Will cause incompatibilities with no performance gain. #link:[Universal Tweaks](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/universal-tweaks) already has its own Frustum Culling tweak.
Outdated and has several bugs. SauriaLib remains compatible with existing mods that depend on GeckoLib 3. Use #link:[SauriaLib](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/saurialib).

patchList.modDescription: Patch some known bugs from Industrial Foregoing for 1.12.2 as it is officially EOL.
Fixes modded GUI overlaps with the JEI window.
Adds a large number of Just Enough Resources integrations.

message: Will cause incompatibilities with no performance gain. #link:[Universal Tweaks](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/universal-tweaks) already has its own Frustum Culling tweak.
Incompatible with Forgelin-Continuous. Use #link:[LibrarianLib-Continuous](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/librarianlib-continuous). Revert if Wizardry animations break.
Outdated, has lots of issues, and requires Custom Mob Spawner. Use #link:[Mo' Creatures Extended](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mo-creatures-extended).
Known to cause crashes, not recommended for use.

Outdated Vintagium fork. Use #link:[Nothirium](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/nothirium) and #link:[Naughthirium](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/naughthirium) or (Cleanroom Only) #link:[Celeritas](https://github.com/kappa-maintainer/Celeritas-auto-build/releases).
Merged into #link:[OpenBlocks Reopened](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/openblocks-reopened), no other mods require it.
Merged into #link:[OpenBlocks Reopened](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/openblocks-reopened), no other mods require it.

Use #link:[JSON Paintings](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/json-paintings) and #link:[Painting Selection GUI](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/paintings/files/7156791) for a better experience.
Outdated. Use #link:[Patchouli ROFL Edition](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/patchouli-rofl-edition). Revert if incompatibilities occur.

Incompatible with Cleanroom and several modern optimization mods. Use #link:[Alfheim Lighting Engine](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/alfheim-lighting-engine) or Hesperus for better compatibility and performance.
Release version is abandoned. Use #link:[Railcraft Beta](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/railcraft/files/3853491) for fixes.

patchList.modDescription: Fixes issues left in old versions of Railcraft.

message: Does not work with Cleanroom Launcher. Use the Cleanroom Edition replacement.
Modern Java versions fix the issue this mod solves.
May break text rendering in some mods.

Outdated. Use #link:[/Sound Physics Remixin](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/sound-physics-remixin). For Forge, use #link:[version 1.1.15 or below](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/sound-physics-remixin/files/6723296).
Outdated. Use #link:[Flare](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/flare) as a modern alternative.
If you plan on adding The Aurorian mod, make sure to disable `Acid` and `Rubber` in config.
CRITICAL: Uses a library that has a known RCE exploit. Remove immediately and use #link:[Survival Tools](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/survival-tools).
Outdated. Use #link:[Tinkers' Antique](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkers-antique) which merges modern features and backports.

patchList.modDescription: Numerous tweaks, fixes, enahancments and overhauls for Thaumcraft 6.
Improved Thaumcraft cross-mod interoperability and fixes several issues with the Golem harvest seal.
Large scale Thaumcraft 6 integration addon. Highly configurable.
Augmenting Thaumcraft 6 with a variety of fresh and familiar content.
An unofficial continuation of Thaumic Wonders.

message: Overwrites classes and breaks compatibility. Use #link:[Thaumcraft Fix](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/thaumcraftfix).
Use #link:[ThaumicTweaker](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/thaumictweaker) for a better implementation of subtitles.
Overwrites methods and breaks compatibility. Use #link:[ThaumicTweaker](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/thaumictweaker) instead.

Broken and abandoned performance mod. Use #link:[Nothirium](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/nothirium) and #link:[Naughthirium](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/naughthirium) or (Cleanroom Only) #link:[Celeritas](https://github.com/kappa-maintainer/Celeritas-auto-build/releases).

patchList.modDescription: A Companion mod for Witchery: Resurrected, patching bugs, adding integrations and introducing modpack maker-oriented features.
